title: Unused Keen music?
content:
I just downloaded the ChipTunes Adlib archive and I noticed that under the Apogee/Commander Keen section there are a couple of IMF files I've never seen before, that aren't used in the game. I wonder if these were rejects or if they would've been used in Keen Dreams?

Interestingly enough, the archive also includes CAMEIN.IMF, which is that one ripped from the game that doesn't seem to be used for anything, which is curious in that the archive has a filename for it...

[url=http://chiptunes.back2roots.org/adlib/Apogee.zip]Apogee.zip[/url] (768kB)

The full archive is downloadable from the [url=http://chiptunes.back2roots.org]homepage[/url].

title: Re: Unused Keen music?
content:
camein.imf was used for the gameover in Keen 5.

The ones not in Keen were bullfrog, dopey, and iscream.
bullfrog.imf sounds like it'd be in Bio Menace to me.

Yeah, and that Jazz Me is the one not used in the game (there's two versions)-Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: Unused Keen music?
content: Oh yes, you're right - I didn't realise camein.imf was used at all.  iscream.imf was actually used only once, as the music for the 'Bloog Control Center' in Keen 6, the level you're looking for Molly in.

title: Re: Unused Keen music?
content:
No, iscream isn't used (at least i think so)
Listen to ominous.imf-Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: Unused Keen music?
content:

That thread got lost.
I don't recall anything other than what's been said in this thread though.
I e-mailed the site too, but never got a reply. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] Retodon8

title: Re: Unused Keen music?
content: iscream sounds like it's heavily inspired by spacfunk, almost as if it's a slower, more ominous version of the same track.
